text: Avneet Kaur (born 13 October 2001) is an Indian actress, dancer and model. She is known for portraying Princess Yasmine in Aladdin – Naam Toh Suna Hoga and Charumati in Chandra Nandini. ==Filmography== ===Television=== Year Title Role Ref. 2010 Dance India Dance Li'l Masters Contestant 2011 Dance Ke Superstars 2012 Jhalak Dikhhla Jaa 5 2011-2012 Meri Maa Jhilmil 2012 Tedhe Hain Par Tere Mere Hain Herself 2013 Savitri Young Damyanti Ek Mutthi Aasmaan Young Pakhi ZeeQ's Weekly Rap Herself 2014-2015 Hamari Sister Didi Khushi 2015 Twistwala Love Raina Mehra 2016 Crime Patrol Kajal 2017 Chandra Nandini Princess Charumati 2018-2020 Aladdin - Naam Toh Suna Hoga Sultana Yasmine 2019 Kitchen Champion Herself 2020 Kuch Smiles Ho Jayein...
